detail_desc: Cropped, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a twisted detail at the hem.
Slightly boxy jumper knitted in a soft, fluffy wool blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a terry appliqué on the front, Jersey-lined, wrapover, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Top in organic cotton jersey and a pair of culottes in viscose jersey. Top with short sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Culottes with elasticated smocking at the waist.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with appliqués at the top and an embroidered motif and holes for the eyes in the turned-up hem.

Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Decorative seams and concealed pockets at the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Parka in a cotton weave with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Adjustable elastication at the back of the waist, a decorative drawstring, side pockets with a fake flap and press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Longer at the back. Lined.
Block-coloured jersey T-shirt in a soft cotton blend.
Biker jacket in grained imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and a collar with decorative press-studs. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top and short sleeves with ribbed trims.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic slub cotton jersey with a button placket and ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Patch side pockets with raw, roll edges, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a large metal buckle. Width approx. 2.2 cm.

Pyjamas with a T-shirt and short shorts in soft jersey. T-shirt with a round, ribbed neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and overlocked hems.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft jersey. Top with a V-neck and wrapover front for easier nursing access, and seam under the bust. Bottoms with a wide waist panel that is elasticated at the top for best fit over the tummy, and elasticated hems.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a narrow elasticated edge, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Calf-length jeans in washed stretch cotton denim with a high waist, small front pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and slim, tapered legs.

Set with a shirt and shorts in a cotton weave. Short-sleeved shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Shorts with detachable elastic braces, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and fake side pockets.

Shirt in checked cotton poplin with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft viscose jersey with decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and calf-length legs.

Coat in a felted wool blend. Stand-up collar with concealed press-studs, a concealed zip down the front and a yoke at the back. Diagonal side pockets and two inner pockets. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled and the polyester is partly recycled.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with pleats front and back, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Unlined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short skirt in jersey with a shimmering pattern. High waist, a concealed zip at the back and frills down the front. Lined.
Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with a round neck, long sleeves and a seam at the waist. Short jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Leggings in stretch imitation leather with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs.

Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and short sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and pleats at the front of the skirt for added width. Unlined.
Printed stretch velour trousers with an elasticated waist and flared legs.
Chinos in airy, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders, gently tapered sleeves and an accentuated waist to create a flattering silhouette.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Round-necked tops in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves. Two of the tops have a frilled collar.
Scarf in a soft weave with raw edges and fringing on the short sides. Size approx. 110x200 cm.
Tops in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam and a flared skirt.
Short shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Trims in a contrasting colour at the sides and hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Pleats at the front and a box pleat at the back. Lined.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Relaxed fit with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. Keyring with a chain and carabiner hook.
Jumper in a soft lace knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Short-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flounced skirt.
Skirt in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pockets, pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Handkerchief in patterned mulberry silk. Size 33x33 cm.

Fitted top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short, voluminous puff sleeves in a cotton weave. Square neckline front and back and elasticated edges over the shoulders and around the sleeves.
Elasticated scrunchies in woven fabric with a knot detail.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a small frilled collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked bodice. Short, elasticated puff sleeves, and a frill trim at the hem.

prod_name: SB Nicholas water resi Ski Jkt
detail_desc: Padded ski jacket in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, a chest pocket, a sleeve pocket and zipped side pockets. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs and a snow flap with press-studs at the waist. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Set with a headband and pair of wrist warmers in a soft alpaca blend. Headband with a decorative knot at the front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and thumbholes at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Striped shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, metal press-studs down the front and short wide sleeves with a decorative grosgrain trim. Straight hem.
V-neck top in ribbed crêpe with a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a concealed button, low dropped shoulders, balloon sleeves with close-fitting cuffs, and closer-fitting ribbing at the hem.
Short, wide, sports top in printed, fast-drying mesh layered over a vest top with a racer back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, lacing and shimmering metallic plastic links at the sides.
Wide, straight-cut sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Loose fit with a round, slightly wider neckline, short sleeves, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains and a sparkly link, one with a pendant. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Cardigan in a soft, loose, textured knit with 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons.
Pyjamas in a patterned viscose weave. Top with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm. The polyester content of the scarf is partly recycled.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Multi-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs One chain with glass beads and three chains with pendants. Adjustable length of approx. 38-45 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
V-neck top in an airy weave with pleats on the shoulders and short, raglan butterfly sleeves. Gathers at the back of the neck and a rounded hem.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a fabric patch on the chest, a padded, lined drawstring hood and an adjustable tab with press-studs at the top. Two-way zip down the front with a chin guard and a wind flap with concealed press-studs. Chest pockets with a concealed zip, flap front pockets with concealed press-studs, concealed side pockets behind the front pockets and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Adjustable tabs with press-studs at the cuffs and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.

Short dress in an airy, patterned Tencel™ lyocell blend with detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a silicone trim at the top. Draping at the front, smocking at the back, a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Satin lining.
